short_summary: Remote Piloted Aircraft Infrastructure Project (RPAS) to be secured by Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME...
full_summary:
=================================
**EP076-241270 - Remote Piloted Aircraft Infrastructure Project (RPAS)**

**Title:** RFP: Remote Piloted Aircraft Infrastructure Project (RPAS)

**Reference Number:** WS4277792818 - Doc 4394717594
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** WS4277792818
**Publication Date:** January 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

**Project Overview:**
This is an open tender project to design, build, and maintain the infrastructure required for Remote Piloted Aircraft (RPA) operations in support of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). Bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) prior to contract award.

**Site Visit:**
A mandatory site visit will be held on Thursday, January 25, 2024, at 10:00 AM at 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, ON K1V 9B2. Interested bidders are required to meet at this location and provide government-issued identification for sign-in purposes.

**Security Requirements:**
A mandatory security requirement applies to this procurement. Bidders must hold a valid DOS at the time of contract award. Failure to meet this requirement will result in the bidder's offer being rendered non-compliant and non-evaluable.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Katia-Annik Torkia (SPAC/PSPC) at katia-annik.torkia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or refer to the attached notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18519110.

**Technical Specifications:**
This project includes specialized construction and maintenance services (UNSPSC: 72150000) and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The contract value will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price meeting the mandatory security requirement.

**Timeline:**

* Publication Date: January 15, 2024
* Site Visit: January 25, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 8, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 5, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Important Note:**
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time). B
